_source.text: 9 out of 10 times the children that act in European films are better than many Hollywood actors, so a movie built around children in a Euro movie doesn't scare me off like a Hollywood movie would... I'm pretty up on my Euro-horror, so I don't know how this one slipped under the radar with me.

text: ... I'm pretty up on my Euro-**horror**, so I don't know how **this** one slipped **under** **the** **radar** with me.
9 out of 10 times the children that act in European films are **better** **than** many Hollywood actors, so
